description:
It can be easy to forget that an alien world lives right beneath us –the mysterious ecosystem of the deep ocean, where the creatures of your nightmares lurk far below the surface.那些生活在我们脚下的外星世界很让人容易遗忘——神秘的大海深处中生活着你噩梦中那些怪异的生物。

But, the Twitter feed of one Russian fisherman could make you think twice before ever dipping your toes at the beach again.但是，一位俄罗斯渔夫的twitter恐怕会让你在踏上海滩前三思而行。Roman Fedortsov works on a trawler based out of a port in northwest Russia, and began sharing his remarkable finds earlier this year, the Moscow Times reports.据《莫斯科时报》报道，罗马·费多尔索夫在俄罗斯西北部的一个港口工作，今年早些时候开始分享他的“重大发现”。


The fisherman has revealed photos of the bizarre chimaera, a fish commonly known as the ‘ghost shark.’该渔民发布了一张诡异的银鲛照片，渔民通常叫它叫它“幽灵鲨”
Chimaera are known for their winged fins and long, whip-like tails – and an image captured by Fedortsov reveals their haunting green eyes. But, these glow only when exposed to light.银鲛以其有翼的鳍和长长的像鞭子一样的尾巴闻名，而费多尔索夫所拍摄的照片上它的眼睛发绿光。但是，只有在光线的照射下才会发光。


With one photo of a bizarre, alien-like creature with a massive jaw and sharp teeth, the fisherman wrote, ‘We’re still arguing about this one. What is it?’ 照片上一只长得像外星人的生物，有很大的下巴和锋利的牙齿，该渔民写道, ‘我们还在争论这个，这是什么？’


And, not all of the catches are fish.但是，他捕获的并不都是鱼。

One picture reveals a massive orange ‘sea spider’ – a marine arthropod with long, spindly legs that’s roughly the size of a human hand.其中一张照片上的是一只巨大的成色的“海蜘蛛”-腿又长又宽，几乎有人手掌大小。


Another bizarre fish, with bulging red eyes and drooping red lips, was identified as a type of grenadier.另一种奇怪的鱼，突出的红色眼睛和下垂的红色嘴唇，被认为是一种鳕鱼。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 这些深海怪鱼 真的不是来自外星球吗？！
